name: The Social Distancing Owl
description:
STORY

The virus is spreading quickly and people are not complying with keeping the social distancing in the park. The magic Wizard Owl wants to make sure people are safe and uses his social distancing-spell to yeet people away from each other and into the hospital zone if they are infected.

CREATORS
  • Christoffer Bech @redguychris
  • Erik Høj
  • Brian Lund Lauridsen @IAmNoBrian
CONTROLS
  • Use WASD to control the Wizard Owl
  • Hold left mouse button to charge your social distancing spell
  • Infected people (red) can be cured if thrown into the hospital zone

This game was created in less than 48 hours  as part of a game jam called 'Create Jam' with the theme: "Some Wizard and the mystery of the smoking owl".
